System¶

The Inhaltstyp model¶

Internal name:contenttypes.ContentType
Implemented by:ContentType

Views on Inhaltstyp

  • Inhaltstypen (ContentTypes) (Menu Konfigurierung ‣ System ‣ Inhaltstypen)

Fields in Inhaltstyp

  • ID (id, AutoField), name (name, CharField), app label (app_label, CharField), Python Modell-Klassenname (model, CharField)

The site config model¶

Internal name:system.SiteConfig
Implemented by:SiteConfig

Views on site config

  • site configs (SiteConfigs)

Fields in site config

  • Funktion des ersten Unterzeichners (signer1_function, ForeignKey to Funktion) – Kontaktfunktion “Sekretär”

  • Funktion des zweiten Unterzeichners (signer2_function, ForeignKey to Funktion) – Kontaktfunktion “Präsident”

  • Nächste Partnernummer (next_partner_id, IntegerField) – Nächste Partnernummer

  • Firma, die diesen Site betreibt (site_company, ForeignKey to Organisation) – The Company to be used as sender in documents.

  • Default system note type (system_note_type, ForeignKey to Event Type) – Note Type used by system notes. If this is empty, then system notes won’t create any entry to the Notes table.

  • Lokales Arbeitsamt (job_office, ForeignKey to Organisation) – The Company whose contact persons

    will be choices for Person.job_office_contact.

  • Gerichtsvollzieher (debts_bailiff_type, ForeignKey to Klientenkontaktart) – Klientenkontaktart Gerichtsvollzieher

  • Budget-Kopiervorlage (master_budget, ForeignKey to Budget) – Das Budget, dessen Inhalt in neue Budgets kopiert wird.

  • Sektor (sector, ForeignKey to Sektor) – The CBSS sector/subsector of the requesting organization. For PCSWs this is always 17.1. Used in SSDN requests as text of the MatrixID and MatrixSubID elements of AuthorizedUser. Used in ManageAccess requests as default value for the non-editable field sector (which defines the choices of the purpose field).

  • Anfragende Organisation (cbss_org_unit, CharField) – In CBSS requests, identifies the requesting organization. For PCSWs this is the enterprise number (CBE, KBO) and should have 10 digits and no formatting characters.

    Used in SSDN requests as text of the AuthorizedUserOrgUnit element . Used in new style requests as text of the CustomerIdentificationcbeNumber element .

  • SSDN User Id (ssdn_user_id, CharField) – Used in SSDN requests as text of the AuthorizedUserUserID element.

  • SSDN email address (ssdn_email, EmailField) – Used in SSDN requests as text of the AuthorizedUserEmail element.

  • HTTP username (cbss_http_username, CharField) – Used in the http header of new-style requests.

  • HTTP password (cbss_http_password, CharField) – Used in the http header of new-style requests.

  • ... and ID (id, AutoField), Standard-Konstruktionsmethode (default_build_method, CharField), Sekretär (signer1, ForeignKey to Person), Präsident (signer2, ForeignKey to Person), Kalender für Kliententermine (client_calendar, ForeignKey to Kalender), Rolle des Klienten in Terminen (client_guestrole, ForeignKey to Gastrolle), Rolle der anderen bei Gruppenterminen (team_guestrole, ForeignKey to Gastrolle), Default calendar for prompt events (prompt_calendar, ForeignKey to Kalender), Eigenschaftsgruppe Fähigkeiten (propgroup_skills, ForeignKey to Eigenschaftsgruppe), Eigenschaftsgruppe Sozialkompetenzen (propgroup_softskills, ForeignKey to Eigenschaftsgruppe), Eigenschaftsgruppe Hindernisse (propgroup_obstacles, ForeignKey to Eigenschaftsgruppe), Event type of attestations (attestation_note_nature, ForeignKey to Event Type), Upload-Art Aufenthaltserlaubnis (residence_permit_upload_type, ForeignKey to Upload-Art), Upload-Art Arbeitserlaubnis (work_permit_upload_type, ForeignKey to Upload-Art), Upload-Art Führerschein (driving_licence_upload_type, ForeignKey to Upload-Art)

Actions on site config

  • Site-Cache rekonstruieren (do_build, BuildSiteCache)

The Event Type model¶

Internal name:notes.EventType
Implemented by:EventType

Views on Event Type

  • Ereignisarten (EventTypes) (Menu Konfigurierung ‣ Büro ‣ Ereignisarten)

Fields in Event Type

  • ID (id, AutoField), Bezeichnung (name, BabelCharField), Bemerkung (remark, TextField), Inhalt (body, BabelTextField)

Tables referring to Event Type

  • Ereignisse/Notizen (NotesByEventType)

The Notizart model¶

Internal name:notes.NoteType
Implemented by:NoteType

Views on Notizart

  • Notizarten (NoteTypes) (Menu Konfigurierung ‣ Büro ‣ Notizarten)

Fields in Notizart

  • als Anhang per E-Mail (attach_to_email, BooleanField) – Whether the printable file should be attached to the email when creating an email from a mailable of this type.
  • E-Mail-Vorlage (email_template, CharField) – The name of the file to be used as template when creating an email from a mailable of this type.
  • Body template (body_template, CharField) – The body template to be used when rendering a printable of this type. This is a list of files with extension .body.html.
  • ... and ID (id, AutoField), Bezeichnung (name, BabelCharField), Konstruktionsmethode (build_method, CharField), Vorlage (template, CharField), wichtig (important, BooleanField), Bemerkung (remark, TextField), Bescheinigung (is_attestation, BooleanField)

Tables referring to Notizart

  • Ereignisse/Notizen (NotesByType)

The Ereignis/Notiz model¶

Internal name:notes.Note
Implemented by:Note

Views on Ereignis/Notiz

  • Ereignisse/Notizen (Notes) (Menu Explorer ‣ Büro ‣ Ereignisse/Notizen)
  • Meine Ereignisse/Notizen (MyNotes) (Menu Büro ‣ Meine Ereignisse/Notizen)
  • Ereignisse/Notizen (NotesByType)
  • Ereignisse/Notizen (NotesByEventType)
  • Ereignisse/Notizen (NotesByProject)
  • Ereignisse/Notizen (NotesByPerson)
  • Ereignisse/Notizen (NotesByCompany)

Fields in Ereignis/Notiz

  • ID (id, AutoField), Verknüpft mit (Modell) (owner_type, ForeignKey to Inhaltstyp), Verknüpft mit (Objekt) (owner_id, GenericForeignKeyIdField), Autor (user, ForeignKey to Benutzer), Klient (project, ForeignKey to Klient), Druckdatum (build_time, DateTimeField), Empfänger (Organisation) (company, ForeignKey to Organisation), Empfänger (Person) (contact_person, ForeignKey to Person), in seiner Eigenschaft als (contact_role, ForeignKey to Funktion), Datum (date, DateField), Notizart (Inhalt) (type, ForeignKey to Notizart), Ereignisart (Form) (event_type, ForeignKey to Event Type), Betreff (subject, CharField), Inhalt (body, RichTextField), Sprache (language, LanguageField)

Actions on Ereignis/Notiz

  • Duplizieren (duplicate, Duplicate)
  • Drucken (do_print, CachedPrintAction)
  • Cache löschen (do_clear_cache, ClearCacheAction)
  • per E-Mail (create_mail, CreateMail) – Create an email from this

The Upload model¶

Internal name:uploads.Upload
Implemented by:Upload

Views on Upload

  • Uploads (Uploads) (Menu Explorer ‣ Büro ‣ Uploads)
  • Meine Uploads (MyUploads)

Fields in Upload

  • ID (id, AutoField), Verknüpft mit (Modell) (owner_type, ForeignKey to Inhaltstyp), Verknüpft mit (Objekt) (owner_id, GenericForeignKeyIdField), Autor (user, ForeignKey to Benutzer), Erstellt (created, DateTimeField), Bearbeitet (modified, DateTimeField), File (file, FileField), MIME type (mimetype, CharField), Upload-Art (type, ForeignKey to Upload-Art), gültig bis (valid_until, DateField), Beschreibung (description, CharField)

The Upload-Art model¶

Internal name:uploads.UploadType
Implemented by:UploadType

Views on Upload-Art

  • Upload-Arten (UploadTypes) (Menu Konfigurierung ‣ Büro ‣ Upload-Arten)

Fields in Upload-Art

  • ID (id, AutoField), Name (name, CharField)
